title: The Spiral Road [1962 - USA] (Rock Hudson) adventure
description:
The Spiral Road (1962 - USA)

Adventure

starring . . . . Rock Hudson, Burl Ives, Gena Rowlands
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0056516/


Filmed at Paramaribo, Suriname

Directed by Robert Mulligan, who also did To Kill a Mockingbird, The Spiral Road follows Anton Drager, an opportunistic young doctor who travels the jungles of the Dutch West Indies on a quest for knowledge and money. Planning to profit later, Dr. Drager sets out to learn all he can about leprosy from a renowned and eccentric older physician, Brits Jansen. However, his journey becomes more spiritual when a terrifying meeting with a black-magic medicine man forces him to reevaluate both his self-serving past and his plans for the future.

Video: XviD, 720x352, 25.000 fps, 1808 Kbps, 02h19m21s
